// Simple logger utility for development
const isDevelopment=process.env.NODE_ENV==='development';const logger={debug:function(message){let data=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:null;if(isDevelopment){console.log("\uD83D\uDD0D [DEBUG] ".concat(message),data||'');}},info:function(message){let data=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:null;if(isDevelopment){console.log("\u2139\uFE0F [INFO] ".concat(message),data||'');}},warn:function(message){let data=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:null;console.warn("\u26A0\uFE0F [WARN] ".concat(message),data||'');},error:function(message){let error=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:null;console.error("\u274C [ERROR] ".concat(message),error||'');},location:function(message){let data=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:null;if(isDevelopment){console.log("\uD83D\uDCCD [LOCATION] ".concat(message),data||'');}}};export default logger;
